title: Oh raamaa Oh raamaa
sahitya:
O rAma O rAma OnkAradhAma O rAma O rAma Onarincu prEma

 

caraNam 1



nAmElu nandaru navvuTakAyE nEmani tALudu nIka dEvarAya

   

caraNam 2



 nannEci nandaku nayamEmi kaligE ninnE nera nammiti nIvE nA salige

   

caraNam 3



 nIkE dagiyunnAnu nijamu nAmATa sAkEta rAma rakSaNa sEyapuTa

   

caraNam 4



 dharalOna rakSkulu lERu dEva maracitE veracitE mAkEmi dOva

   

caraNam 5



 I janmamenduku evaru tanakEla rAjIva nEtra daya rAnidi mEla

   

caraNam 6



 hrdayamu caluvaite mudamu nIpAlu sudayAluda vaitE sukhamu nIvElu

   

caraNam 7



 Atmakai okaTaina Ashinca lEdu paramAtma nIkani palka manasEla rAdu

   

caraNam 8



 nIraina pAlaina nIkE unukoNTi tIraina cakkani dEva kanukoNTi

   

caraNam 9



 nI kAshinciti gAni nimiSamu mAnEkemi nannElu kOkuNTEyana

 

caraNam 10



 nI kaNTE dorakunA nirupama gAtra parAkEla shrI tyAgarAjuni mitra
